name: golden-ratio
title: Golden Ratio
description: Gold ratio and silver ratio calculation tool
author: yang_monch

commands.name: golden-ratio
commands.title: Golden Ratio
commands.description: Enter the numbers to calculate the golden ratio

commands.name: silver-ratio
commands.title: Silver Ratio
commands.description: Enter the numbers to calculate the silver ratio

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
